title: Uno Minda lines up over Rs 610 crore investments on new plant in Indonesia, India capacity expansion
description: Uno Minda Ltd is investing over Rs 610 crore to set up a new plant in Indonesia and expand its domestic capacity in India. The new Indonesian facility will be operational by Q4 FY26, while the Indian expansions include new plants in Haryana and Karnataka, expected to commence operations by Q1 FY27.
